metadata.synopsis: Astarion is staring at the other companions around the campfire. He's friendly and affable, but his mind is on his hunger. He starts to wonder what the others taste like, although he's MOSTLY joking. In the end he decides to remove himself, before the conversation gets too real.

27.speaker: Astarion
27.text: You know, I was just thinking about you. Remembering our little encounter in the night.
27.context: NodeContext: recalls player kneeing him in the balls

89.speaker: Player
89.text: When you tried to bite me?

98.speaker: Astarion
98.text: The very same. It obviously put me off your neck, but now I can't help but wonder how the others taste.

15.speaker: Astarion
15.text: You can rest easy, I don't intend a repeat performance. Although I do wonder how the others might taste.

87.speaker: Astarion
87.text: Not that anyone's volunteered, it's just an idle fancy.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: I wouldn't expect any volunteers either.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: Do you have your eye on anyone in particular?

79.speaker: Astarion
79.text: No, that's the thing. I can't quite figure them out.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: A dangerous 'fancy'. They're all off the menu.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: A pity, they can be annoying sometimes.

38.speaker: Astarion
38.text: We still need them. That doesn't stop me from wondering, of course.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: You're lucky I didn't kill you.

57.speaker: Astarion
57.text: And I am very grateful. It did get me thinking about the others, though. How they might taste.

60.speaker: Astarion
60.text: There you are, I was just thinking about you. And that delicious moment we shared the other night.
60.context: NodeContext: recalls player kneeing him in the balls

77.speaker: Player
77.text: The moment when you bit me?
77.context: NodeContext: recalls player kneeing him in the balls

43.speaker: Astarion
43.text: The very same. I've had this condition for two centuries, but truth be told? You were my first.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: Savour the memory. It won't happen again.
63.context: NodeContext: recalls player kneeing him in the balls

84.speaker: Astarion
84.text: Pity, you're tastier than you know. And you were my first.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: I had to fight you off me!
67.context: NodeContext: recalls player kneeing him in the balls

42.speaker: Astarion
42.text: Yes, I'm still rather tender, now that you mention it.
42.context: NodeContext: recalls player kneeing him in the balls

70.speaker: Astarion
70.text: I admit, I may have been a little eager. But can you blame me? You were my first.

10.speaker: Astarion
10.text: And I am deeply sorry. I was overeager - but can you blame me? You were my first.

3.speaker: Astarion
3.text: In all these years, I've only ever fed on beasts. Drinking the blood of thinking creatures is a different thing entirely.

95.speaker: Astarion
95.text: You were delectable. And now I just can't help but wonder how the others taste.

97.speaker: Player
97.text: They might not be as open to the idea as I was.

19.speaker: Astarion
19.text: Alas. It doesn't hurt to ponder the question, though.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Hurt them and I'll kill you, no hesitation.

61.speaker: Astarion
61.text: You're a sweetheart, but you don't need to worry - I'm just thinking out loud.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: You're looking at other necks? I'm hurt.

37.speaker: Astarion
37.text: Don't worry, there's enough of me to go around. I'm a man of tremendous appetites.

41.speaker: Astarion
41.text: I don't think they'd volunteer, of course, but it doesn't make me any less curious.

91.speaker: Astarion
91.text: I'm all too familiar with Gale's blood, unfortunately. I can't recommend it.

17.speaker: Astarion
17.text: Take Gale, for example. He strikes me as someone whose blood is rich, refined like a well-aged brandy.

82.speaker: Astarion
82.text: But Karlach? A tiefling seasoned by hellsfire? What could she possibly taste like?

48.speaker: Player
48.text: Something potent, I'm sure. A smoky Waterdeep whiskey?

55.speaker: Astarion
55.text: Take Wyll, for example. A man of the people, very palatable, like a sweet cider.

54.speaker: Astarion
54.text: Take Shadowheart, for example. She strikes me as having a heavy, enigmatic flavour - vintage port on two legs.

9.speaker: Astarion
9.text: Take Karlach, for example, her blood aged in the Hells. She's potent, like a fiery whiskey.

18.speaker: Astarion
18.text: But the gith? What in the hells would she taste like?

39.speaker: Player
39.text: Something exotic, surely? An Amnan liqueur?

94.speaker: Player
94.text: I'd prefer a beer, if it's all the same to you.

12.speaker: Astarion
12.text: Yes, heavens forbid we'd have an interesting conversation.

36.speaker: Astarion
36.text: Still, I am intrigued by the possibilities...

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Keep your eyes to yourself. You'll make people nervous.
66.context: NodeContext: response to "are you asking which of my friends I'd want to eat?!"

46.speaker: Astarion
46.context: NodeContext: response to "are you asking which of my friends I'd want to eat?!"

7.speaker: Astarion
7.text: So - in the spirit of theoretical questions - if you had to take a bite from one of them, who would it be?
7.context: NodeContext: response to "are you asking which of my friends I'd want to eat?!"

32.speaker: Player
32.text: I much prefer eating flesh to blood.
32.context: NodeContext: response to "are you asking which of my friends I'd want to eat?!"

78.speaker: Astarion
78.text: I do appreciate your enthusiasm, but let's try to restrain ourselves a little.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Are you really asking which of our companions I'd eat?
4.context: NodeContext: response to "are you asking which of my friends I'd want to eat?!"

52.speaker: Astarion
52.context: NodeContext: response to "are you asking which of my friends I'd want to eat?!"

33.speaker: Astarion
33.text: I just mean a sip of their blood. No mastication required.

58.speaker: Astarion
58.text: What? I was only making conversation!

20.speaker: Astarion
20.text: Honestly, you have no sense of fun.

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: Ah, a refined palate! I can't disagree.

14.speaker: Astarion
14.text: Although the more I think on it, the hungrier I get. I'd better go find something I can actually get my teeth into.

96.speaker: Astarion
96.text: There's nothing that tasty lurking out in the woods, but I'll make do. Sweet dreams.

93.speaker: Astarion
93.text: Nothing out there will taste as good as the alternatives, but I'll make do. Sweet dreams.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: Anything that keeps you away from our necks.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I could be tempted to try Lae'zel.

26.speaker: Astarion
26.text: Mmm, a meal that would put up a fight. An adventurous choice.

65.speaker: Astarion
65.text: A fine choice. She is enticing.

86.speaker: Astarion
86.text: Interesting. I always thought he'd taste a little too sweet.

30.speaker: Astarion
30.text: Oh, I'm flattered. Who knew you had such taste?

45.speaker: Astarion
45.text: Unfortunately, all this talk is getting me hungry. I'd better find something I can actually sink my teeth into.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Could I convince you to kill someone less useful?

47.speaker: Astarion
47.text: No one's getting killed, I swear. We're just two friends talking.

85.speaker: Astarion
85.text: But Shadowheart? I have no idea. How do you think our little enigma would taste?

29.speaker: Player
29.text: Something that could lay you out. Calishite Absinthe, maybe?

76.speaker: Astarion
76.text: Ohh, that sounds very appealing. I'm almost convinced.

34.speaker: Astarion
34.text: And Wyll? Well, I'm not quite sure. How do you think he'd taste?

51.speaker: Player
51.text: He has a good heart. I'm sure he tastes sweet as any cider.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: We are not having this conversation. Good night.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Good. I was getting tired of them anyway.

75.speaker: Astarion
75.text: I'm not going to bite any of them. They don't seem as accommodating as you were.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: You're lucky I didn't drive that stake into your heart.

21.speaker: Astarion
21.text: I appreciate your restraint. It would have spoiled the mood - you were my first, after all.
